verbs.description: President Trump , never one to [V: be] knowingly outshone by his wife Melania Trump , took virtually identical pictures as they posted with law enforcement officers but in different locations .

[ARG0: President Trump , never one to be knowingly outshone by his wife Melania Trump ,] [V: took] [ARG1: virtually identical pictures] [ARGM-ADV: as they posted with law enforcement officers but in different locations] .

President Trump , never one to be knowingly outshone by his wife Melania Trump , took virtually identical pictures as [ARG0: they] [V: posted] [ARG2: with law enforcement officers] but in different locations .
